ticket.title: Can't install rails 2.1.0 using gem
ticket.original-body:
When trying to install rails using 'gem install rails' I get the following error: ERROR: While executing gem ... (Gem::InstallError) invalid gem format for c:/ruby/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/cache/activesupport-2.1.0.gem
I downloaded the active support gem manually from http://rubyforge.org/projects/activesupport/ and placed it the gems cached directory.
That solved the problem. Looks like a repository issue.
ticket.latest-body:
When trying to install rails using 'gem install rails' I get the following error: ERROR: While executing gem ... (Gem::InstallError) invalid gem format for c:/ruby/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/cache/activesupport-2.1.0.gem
I downloaded the active support gem manually from http://rubyforge.org/projects/activesupport/ and placed it the gems cached directory.
That solved the problem. Looks like a repository issue.
ticket.original-body-html:
When trying to install rails using 'gem install rails' I get the following error:

ERROR: While executing gem ... (Gem::InstallError)

invalid gem format for c:/ruby/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/cache/activesupport-2.1.0.gem

I downloaded the active support gem manually from http://rubyforge.org/projects/ac... and placed it the gems cached directory.

That solved the problem. Looks like a repository issue.
